Atelier d'Artiste Special
room.description:
What could be more Parisian than sleeping under the eaves of an artist's attic studio? (We're talking famous artist, obviously.) With blank canvases propping up your pillow, and a carpet splashed with vibrant (and make-believe) gouache, it's a playful nod at the artistic spark that has always burned brightly in the City of Light. Find your own inspiration in this, the hotel's most spacious bedroom.

19 sqm, double bed or twin bed, minibar, safe with enough space for a 17" computer, LED hi-def TV screen, telephone, air-conditioning (heat / cool), radio, DVD /CD/USB player, cable TV with 41 channels, desk, bath with hydromassages and colour therapy or shower with rainysky, hair-dryer, bathrobe, slippers, wake-up call, iron and ironing (on demand), soundproof rooms, free internet access (wireless).

Children under 12 years old Free with 1 accompanying adult upon request. Rollaway bed available.

Free cancellation 7, days prior to arrival. Full amount of stay charged 7 days prior to arrival and non-refundable after that time.

room.title: 1 Bedroom
room.description: - 1 bedroom - 2 to 4 people - 40-50 square meters - double bed (queen size bed) in the bedroom - sofa bed in the living room - separated bathroom - equipped kitchen/kitchenette. All our apartments are of generous space and are fully equipped with micro wave, washing and or drying machine, hair dryer, dishwasher, hover, DVD, alarm clock, internet access (free of charge), amenities…. All our apartments offer double bed type (queen size bed) and sofa bed (except for studio where you may have only a sofa bed available) and we can install upon request a crib at no expense. Extra beds are also available at a supplementary cost.
